text: The 2021 ICF World Junior and U23 Canoe Slalom Championships will take place in Auckland, New Zealand under the auspices of the International Canoe Federation (ICF). It will be the 23rd edition of the competition for Juniors (U18) and the 10th edition for the Under 23 category. It will be the first global canoe slalom championships in New Zealand. ==Medal Summary== ===Men=== ====Canoe==== =====Junior===== {| |- |C1 | || | || | || |- |C1 team | || | || | || |- |C2 | || | || | || |- |C2 team | || | || | || |} =====U23===== {| |- |C1 | || | || | || |- |C1 team | || | || | || |- |C2 | || | || | || |- |C2 team | || | || | || |} ====Kayak==== =====Junior===== {| |- |K1 | || | || | || |- |K1 team | || | || | || |} =====U23===== {| |- |K1 | || | || | || |- |K1 team | || | || | || |} ===Women=== ====Canoe==== =====Junior===== {| |- |C1 | || | || | || |- |C1 team | || | || | || |} =====U23===== {| |- |C1 | || | || | || |- |C1 team | || | || | || |} ====Kayak==== =====Junior===== {| |- |K1 | || | || | || |- |K1 team | || | || | || |} =====U23===== {| |- |K1 | || | || | || |- |K1 team | || | || | || |} ===Mixed=== ====Canoe==== =====U23===== {| |- |C2 | || | || | || |- |C2 team | || | || | || |} ==Medal table== *To be added as the championships progress. ==References== ==External links== *International Canoe Federation World Junior and U23 Canoe Slalom Championships Category:ICF World Junior and U23 Canoe Slalom Championships Canoe Slalom World Junior Championships 2021
title: 2021 World Junior and U23 Canoe Slalom Championships
